scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && tsc -m es6 --outDir dist/lib-esm && webpack && node-sass src/styles.scss -o dist
scripts.dev: npm run dev:styles && concurrently "webpack-dev-server" "node-sass --watch src/styles.scss -o examples" "node-sass --watch src/examples/examples.scss -o examples"
scripts.dev:styles: node-sass src/styles.scss -o examples && node-sass src/examples/examples.scss -o examples
